app_info.description: Safe Eyes protects your eyes from eye strain (asthenopia) by reminding you to take breaks while you're working long hours at the computer.

exercises.short_break_close_eyes: Csukja be hosszabb időre a szemét!
exercises.short_break_rotate_clockwise: Rotate your eyes in clockwise direction
exercises.short_break_rotate_counter_clockwise: Rotate your eyes in counterclockwise direction
exercises.short_break_blink: Pislogjon és forgassa meg a szemeit!

messages.software_required: To enable this feature, please install {}

ui_controls.audible_alert: Audible alert at the end of break
ui_controls.disable_keyboard_shortcut: Shortcut disabled period to prevent unintentional skip (in seconds)
ui_controls.enable_screen_lock: Lock the screen after every long break
ui_controls.idle_time: Minimum idle time to pause (in minutes)
ui_controls.no_of_short_breaks_between_two_long_brea: Hány rövid szünet legyen a hosszabbak között?
ui_controls.show_time_in_tray: Show the next break time in system tray
ui_controls.time_to_screen_lock: Maximum time to skip, bypassing the lock screen (in seconds)
